house_listing.house_description: This condominium built in 1983 has 5 bedroom(s), 6 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) and approximately 3870 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, family room. Features include private pool, private spa, air conditioning.
house_listing.firm_name: Majestic Propertie Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Elevator, Foyer, Smoke Detector, Tennis Court(s), Walk-In Closet(s)
